entry.title: Adding New BIP Editors
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around the selection and commitment process for a certain responsibility within the Bitcoin Development community. A key point raised is the apparent lack of consent or desire from Kanzure to take on this responsibility without compensation. This highlights a procedural flaw where individuals are considered for roles without verifying their willingness or terms for acceptance. The conversation further points out that, among those discussed, only Laolu has explicitly agreed to commit to the responsibility in question. This situation underscores the importance of clear communication and agreement from all parties involved before assigning responsibilities, especially in volunteer-driven or community-based projects. It also brings to light the need for compensatory discussions to ensure those taking on significant roles are supported and willing.
